review: I'm getting to know this device and so far so good.  Hulu plus doesn't seem to work on it as well as roku but all in all I think this is a good device, You tube works great!!!

review: Works as advertised and affordable too!!!!
author: Clarence J. Dendy, Jr.

review: Very simply, turned my "dumb" flatscreen tv into a smart tv for $35.  The ability to "push" app output / youtube / web results to my screen in less than 10 sec is amazing to me. Only difference I see to a smart tv is i need to keep my phone near me while watching chromecast if i want to change programs. (Like my phone isn't near me anyway.), 100% satisfied with purchase.
author: Dan Ortega
